Class MainView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
com.swdprojects.romkaicode.dmsgui.view.MainView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class MainView extends javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
MainView serves to handle UI logic for the GUI functionality of the main window. Relationships: uses secondary View classes (UpdateFilmView, AddFilmView, DeleteFilmView) for their respective functionality/capturing inputs.
